name: Average Joe's Big Day Out or, How I got stuck in a Transpositional Time Loop
name_original: Average Joe's Big Day Out or, How I got stuck in a Transpositional Time Loop
description:
Average Joe's Big Day Out or, How I got stuck in a Transpositional Time Loop is a puzzle game made for Ludum Dare 51. 

Play as Average Joe, a witness to a bank robbery that puts him through the longest day of his life. See, every ten seconds, time seems to loop back on itself. But more than that, every ten seconds, Average Joe wakes up in a new location! How will he get himself out of this conundrum????

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move.

Space/E/Z to interact.

Created by Lane Howard, Ricky Bakersmith, and Karen Spriggs.
